channel.title: Misc on Rikke Solbjørg's home
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Rikke Solbjørg's home

item.title: I exist!
item.description:
Here we are! I should have made this website ages ago, but better late than never. :)

This page is generated using Hugo, with the Hugo Bear Blog theme theme. For now this is just hosted on GitHub Pages, but I would like to move it elsewhere sooner rather than later in hopes of having control of as much of my own web presence as possible. Maybe I’ll finally set up that homelab…
